body_html: Seriously? Read it – it specified ALL SYSTEMS/SYSTEM INDEPENDENT. You provide no instructions on how to write or punctuate N/A (would “n/a” or “not applicable” be acceptable?) and in any case I cannot LEAVE it as “N/A” because there was no “N/A” there to leave in the first place. If the form is machine read, then please provide the parsing instructions that the machine will use (e.g. “please replace each $$$ in what follows with your details. If your details are not relevant please replace the $$$ with ‘N/A’”). If you’re not a machine, then please read what is written; if you are a machine, please provide your specifications. The world is not your mind-reader. So seriously: the issue I raised is about an obvious barrier to helping you improve your documentation. Your response inadvertently highlights another barrier. Sorry to sound so hostile, and it’s nothing personal, but I have found your “Quick Start” documentation among the slowest I have ever worked through.
